dialogue.text: The question spreads through the city like beneficial contagion, each person catching their own variant of wonder.

visual_elements.crowd_scenes: Various people in moments of self-reflection
visual_elements.symbolic_spread: Question moving like wind through leaves

psychological_notes: Evan perceives the universal nature of existential questioning. He sees how 'What am I?' moves through collective consciousness, touching each person uniquely. This represents movement from personal to transpersonal awareness of the human condition.
philosophical_underpinning: Existential uncertainty as evolutionary driver of consciousness
therapeutic_direction: Recognition of shared human experience reducing isolation
